markdownRemark.html:
To apply, please fill in this form. Please note that there is a participation fee for the school of 510 Euros, which covers both accommodation and meals for the full week (Monday to Friday). We have secured some funding to support the participation of early-career scientists and to support trainees/speakers from underrepresented minorities in our field. If you would like to be considered for support, please state so on the application form, and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

The deadline for applications is on Dec 1st at midnight (anywhere on earth).
